column4: How do i do a complete fresh install of samba and delete all the old config files?
can someone just guide me through it
purging a package will remove config files
Sounds like you've messed up sudo somehow, or removed your user from the sudoers.
also when i create a user the user is created with no home dir
How are you creating said users?
See the message ubottu sent you in a query.
i used that command to start with, whats the problem?
obfuscated swearing still is.  Please don't.
